original: sems can gyi kha lo sgyur ba'i rang bzhin thob pa /
analyzed: sems can gyi kha lo sgyur ba'i rang bzhin thob pa /
translated: They had attained the nature of guiding beings.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba /
translated: They had followed the same path as all buddhas.

original: rtag tu rnam par rtog pa med par chos la spyod pa /
analyzed: rtag tu rnam par rtog pa med par chos la spyod pa /
translated: They were always practicing the Dharma without concepts.

original: chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa /
translated: They had realized all the references to the Dharma.🔽They had realized that all phenomena are by nature peace.

original: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar dmigs pa; 'jig rten thams cad shin tu zhi bas gnas tha dad pa med pa la rab tu gzhol ba /
analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar dmigs pa; 'jig rten thams cad shin tu zhi bas gnas tha dad pa med pa la rab tu gzhol ba /
translated: They were dedicated to the fact that all worlds are the same in being completely peaceful.

original: 'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa /
translated: They had entered all the different worlds.

original: gnas med par zhing thams cad du 'dong ba /
analyzed: gnas med par zhing thams cad du 'dong ba /
translated: They went to all realms without remaining anywhere.

original: chos kyi gnas thams cad la bstan pa med par chos thams cad bla gab med pa'i gzhal med khang du byin pa /
analyzed: chos kyi gnas thams cad la bstan pa med par chos thams cad bla gab med pa'i gzhal med khang du byin pa /
translated: They had given all phenomena as a gift in the pavilion of the uncovered sky, without teaching, in all the abodes of the Dharma.

original: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la zhugs pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la zhugs pa /
translated: They were dedicated to ripening and guiding all beings.

original: sems @73a *// can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston pa /
analyzed: sems @73a *// can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston pa /
translated: They showed the path to happiness to all beings.

original: ye shes dang rnam par thar pa shin tu 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can /
analyzed: ye shes dang rnam par thar pa shin tu 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can /
translated: They had a domain that was the abode of the most exalted wisdom and liberation.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa /
translated: They had the body of wisdom that had reached the end of freedom from desire.

original: srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyan  du 'phags pa /
analyzed: srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyan  du 'phags pa /
translated: They were exalted above all the oceans of existence.

original: 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par ston pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par ston pa /
translated: They revealed the limit of reality to all beings.

original: chos rgya mtsho'i shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor can /
analyzed: chos rgya mtsho'i shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor can /
translated: They had the orb of the light of the ocean of the wisdom of the Dharma.

original: ting nge 'dzin gangs chen mtsho dang ldan pa'i dbyings la shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing snying rje chen po rab tu sems pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gangs chen mtsho dang ldan pa'i dbyings la shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing snying rje chen po rab tu sems pa /
translated: They were in the realm of the sameness of the great ocean of samādhi, and they were thinking of great compassion.

original: chos kyi tshul sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu rab tu rtogs pa /
analyzed: chos kyi tshul sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu rab tu rtogs pa /
translated: They had realized the way of the Dharma, which is like an illusion.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmi lam lta bur zhugs pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmi lam lta bur zhugs pa /
translated: They had entered all world systems, which are like dreams.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa /
translated: They had realized that all the visions of the tathāgatas are like reflections.

original: sgra skad dang / dbyangs thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par rig pa /
analyzed: sgra skad dang / dbyangs thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par rig pa /
translated: They were aware that all sounds, voices, and melodies were like echoes.

original: chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes sprul pa lta bur rab tu rtogs pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes sprul pa lta bur rab tu rtogs pa /
translated: They had realized that the wisdom that accomplishes all phenomena is like an emanation.

original: khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam shin tu bsags pa /
analyzed: khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam shin tu bsags pa /
translated: They had accumulated the special aspirations.

original: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rnam par dag pa'i mkhas pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rnam par dag pa'i mkhas pa dang ldan pa /
translated: They were skilled in the completely pure maṇḍala of wisdom.

original: sems shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sems shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa /
translated: They had the peace and complete peace of mind.

original: gzugs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa /
analyzed: gzugs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa /
translated: They had the wisdom that is the domain of all the forms of the tantras.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis dogs pa med pa kun nas rab tu gnon pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis dogs pa med pa kun nas rab tu gnon pa /
translated: They were skilled in the power of samādhi.🔽They had the eyes that reached the end of the domain of the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi mthar phyin pa'i mig dang ldan @73b pa; chos thams cad la dmigs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi mthar phyin pa'i mig dang ldan @73b pa; chos thams cad la dmigs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa /
translated: They had attained the conduct that is without reference point to any phenomena.

original: shes rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod pa /
analyzed: shes rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod pa /
translated: They were skilled in the infinite ocean of wisdom.

original: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa /
translated: He had perfected the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang shugs thob pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang shugs thob pa /
translated: He had attained the power and strength of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
translated: He had perfected the perfection of miraculous powers, having reached the other side of all worlds.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbang du gyur pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbang du gyur pa /
translated: He had mastered the perfection of samādhi.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don mkhas pa la phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don mkhas pa la phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the unmistaken wisdom of the skill in the meaning of all the tathāgatas.

original: chos kyi mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa /
analyzed: chos kyi mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa /
translated: He was skilled in the ritual of opening the treasury of the Dharma.

original: nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par mkhas pa /
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par mkhas pa /
translated: He was skilled in the knowledge of definitions.

original: spobs pa'i stobs dang / chos kyi sprin zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: spobs pa'i stobs dang / chos kyi sprin zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the inexhaustible power of eloquence and the Dharma clouds.

original: mi 'jigs pas khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pa /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pas khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pa /
translated: He had the roar of a bull and a lion through his fearlessness.

original: gnas med pa'i chos kyi dga' ba la dga' bas mos pa /
analyzed: gnas med pa'i chos kyi dga' ba la dga' bas mos pa /
translated: He was dedicated to the joy of the Dharma that is without abode.

original: chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i mig gis blta ba /
analyzed: chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i mig gis blta ba /
translated: He looked at all phenomena with eyes that were free of cataracts.

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa'i zla bar gyur pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa'i zla bar gyur pa /
translated: He was the moon that knows the origin and destruction of the entire world.

original: shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bden pa'i tshul thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i 'od zer can /
analyzed: shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bden pa'i tshul thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i 'od zer can /
translated: He was the one who has the light rays that experience all the ways of the truth with the maṇḍala of wisdom.

original: ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khor yug tu gyur pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khor yug tu gyur pa /
translated: He was the one who has the vajra of wisdom and the surrounding wall of merit.

original: dper bya ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa /
analyzed: dper bya ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa /
translated: He was the one who is beyond all examples.

original: chos thams cad la dbang po dang / ye shes kyi myu gu rab tu skyes pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad la dbang po dang / ye shes kyi myu gu rab tu skyes pa /
translated: He was the one who has the sprouts of the wisdom eye and the eye of merit that arise in all phenomena.

original: dpa' bo'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: dpa' bo'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa /
translated: He was the one who has the banner of the hero.

original: bdud thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba la dpa' ba /🔽ye shes mtha' yas pa'i dkyil @74a *//
analyzed: bdud thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba la dpa' ba / ye shes mtha' yas pa'i dkyil @74a *//
translated: He was the one who is the hero who lowers the banners of all māras.

original: 'khor gyi gzi brjid can /
analyzed: 'khor gyi gzi brjid can /
translated: He was the one who has the splendor of the maṇḍala of infinite wisdom.

original: 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: He was the one who has a body that is superior to all beings.

original: chos thams cad la shes rab sgrib pa med pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad la shes rab sgrib pa med pa /
translated: He was the one who has the unobstructed wisdom of all phenomena.

original: zad pa dang mi zad pa'i mtha'i ye shes kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa /
analyzed: zad pa dang mi zad pa'i mtha'i ye shes kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa /
translated: He was the one who is fully enlightened with the wisdom of the limit of exhaustion and nonexhaustion.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' kun gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' kun gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa /
translated: He was abiding in the perfection of the limit of reality.

original: mtshan ma med pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi mig mngon sum can byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu la mkhas pa /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi mig mngon sum can byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu la mkhas pa /
translated: He had the eye of wisdom that sees the absence of attributes. He had the direct perception of the skill in the cause of accomplishing all the bodhisattva activities.

original: mi gnyis pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the domain of the wisdom of nonduality.

original: 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la rnam par lta ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la rnam par lta ba /
translated: He was looking at all the worldly realms.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud gnas med pa thams cad du gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud gnas med pa thams cad du gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa /
translated: He was the reflection that appears in all the buddha realms that are not places.

original: chos thams cad la mun pa dang rnam par bral ba /
analyzed: chos thams cad la mun pa dang rnam par bral ba /
translated: He was free from the darkness of all phenomena.

original: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mun pa med pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mun pa med pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
translated: He had entered the maṇḍala of wisdom that is free of darkness.

original: phyogs kun tu chos kyi snang ba rab tu bkye ba /
analyzed: phyogs kun tu chos kyi snang ba rab tu bkye ba /
translated: He had spread the light of the Dharma in all directions.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog tu gyur pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog tu gyur pa /
translated: He was the supreme field of merit for all beings.

original: thos pa dang / mthong ba dang; smon lam don yod pa'i zla ba /
analyzed: thos pa dang / mthong ba dang; smon lam don yod pa'i zla ba /
translated: He was the moon of the fulfillment of hearing, seeing, and aspiration.

original: bsod nams kyi ri rab 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa /
analyzed: bsod nams kyi ri rab 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa /
translated: the mountain of merit that is higher than the whole world,

original: phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad tshar gcod pa la shin tu dpa' ba /
analyzed: phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad tshar gcod pa la shin tu dpa' ba /
translated: the one who is very brave in destroying all the hosts of opponents,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sgra skad dang / dbyangs kyi nga ro 'byin pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sgra skad dang / dbyangs kyi nga ro 'byin pa /
translated: the one who emits sounds, voices, and tones in all buddha realms,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mthong bas mi ngoms pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mthong bas mi ngoms pa /
translated: the one who is never satisfied with seeing the bodies of all buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan @74b gyi dbang bsgyur ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan @74b gyi dbang bsgyur ba dang ldan pa /
translated: the one who has control over the reflection of the body of the Buddha,

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba dang mthun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba dang mthun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa /
translated: the one who manifests a body that is in accord with the training of beings,

original: zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad du lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa /
analyzed: zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad du lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa /
translated: the one whose body fills all the infinite realms,

original: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa thogs pa med par 'gro ba'i ye shes chen po'i theg pa'i gru dang ldan pa /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa thogs pa med par 'gro ba'i ye shes chen po'i theg pa'i gru dang ldan pa /
translated: the one who has the great wisdom vehicle that goes without impediment and has the pure maṇḍala of effortless miracles,

original: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rab tu snang ba /
analyzed: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rab tu snang ba /
translated: the one whose body appears in the entire realm of phenomena with the maṇḍala of wisdom,

original: ye shes kyi nyi ma 'gro ba thams cad du shar ba /
analyzed: ye shes kyi nyi ma 'gro ba thams cad du shar ba /
translated: the sun of wisdom rising in all worlds,

original: 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa /
translated: having a color that delights all beings according to their wishes,

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can /
translated: having the wisdom that understands the thoughts and faculties of all beings,

original: chos thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i yul du khong du chud pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i yul du khong du chud pa /
translated: having the realization of the unobstructed domain of all phenomena,

original: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa rnam par rig pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa rnam par rig pa /
translated: having the knowledge of the unborn nature of all phenomena,

original: phra ba dang yangs pa phan tshun du yongs su bsdu ba la dbang bsgyur ba sangs rgyas kyi sa zab mo'i tshul nges par rtogs pa /
analyzed: phra ba dang yangs pa phan tshun du yongs su bsdu ba la dbang bsgyur ba sangs rgyas kyi sa zab mo'i tshul nges par rtogs pa /
translated: having the power to gather the subtle and the vast into each other, having realized the profound way of the stage of buddhahood,

original: don zab mo'i tshig dang / yi ge'i tha snyad la mkhas pa /
analyzed: don zab mo'i tshig dang / yi ge'i tha snyad la mkhas pa /
translated: being skilled in the words and letters of the profound meaning,

original: tshig dang / yi ge dang / don mi zad pa rab tu brjod pa /
analyzed: tshig dang / yi ge dang / don mi zad pa rab tu brjod pa /
translated: expounding the inexhaustible words, letters, and meanings,

original: mdo sde rgya mtsho thams cad tshig gcig tu chud par rab tu ston pa /
analyzed: mdo sde rgya mtsho thams cad tshig gcig tu chud par rab tu ston pa /
translated: teaching that all oceans of sūtras are contained in a single word,

original: gzungs dang ye shes kyi lus rgya chen po byin gyis rlob pa /
analyzed: gzungs dang ye shes kyi lus rgya chen po byin gyis rlob pa /
translated: blessing the vast body of dhāraṇī and wisdom,

original: bskal pa mtha' yas par yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs can /
analyzed: bskal pa mtha' yas par yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs can /
translated: They were empowered with the dhāraṇī of complete retention for limitless eons.

original: sems kyi skad cig gcig gis bskal pa brjod du med par gnas pa rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can /
analyzed: sems kyi skad cig gcig gis bskal pa brjod du med par gnas pa rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can /
translated: They had the wisdom of realizing the ability to remain for inexpressibly many eons in a single instant of mind.

original: @75a *// sems kyi skad cig gcig gis dus gsum shes pa /
analyzed: @75a *// sems kyi skad cig gcig gis dus gsum shes pa /
translated: They knew the three times in a single instant of mind.

original: 'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes pa /
translated: They had the higher perceptions of all worlds.

original: chos kyi gzungs kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dran zhing spobs pa /
analyzed: chos kyi gzungs kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dran zhing spobs pa /
translated: They had the dhāraṇī of the Dharma and the memory and eloquence of the infinite ocean of the Dharma of the buddhas.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa /
translated: They were irreversible from turning the wheel of the Dharma with the methods of being understood by all beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi yul la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yul la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa /
translated: They had attained the illumination of wisdom in the domain of the buddhas.

original: gya nom par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa /
analyzed: gya nom par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa /
translated: They were always in equipoise in the samādhi of the appearance of the sublime.

original: chags pa med pa'i mtha'i chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pa /
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i mtha'i chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pa /
translated: They were skilled in the wisdom that distinguishes all phenomena with the limit of nonattachment.

original: chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul la ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba /
analyzed: chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul la ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba /
translated: He was a master of the wisdom that plays with the objects of the most exalted magical manifestations of all phenomena.

original: dmigs pa thams cad la rgyan bzang por byin gyis rlob pa /
analyzed: dmigs pa thams cad la rgyan bzang por byin gyis rlob pa /
translated: He had the power to transform all objects into beautiful ornaments.

original: chos kyi dbyings phyogs med pa la phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bas rab tu zhugs pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings phyogs med pa la phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bas rab tu zhugs pa /
translated: He had entered the limitless realm of phenomena by following the directions.

original: phyogs thams cad rnam par dbye bas chos kyi dbyings las yang dag par gzhol ba shin tu phra ba ste /
analyzed: phyogs thams cad rnam par dbye bas chos kyi dbyings las yang dag par gzhol ba shin tu phra ba ste /
translated: He was completely absorbed in the realm of phenomena by distinguishing all directions.

original: yangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba rang bzhin kha dog thams cad yongs su ston pa /
analyzed: yangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba rang bzhin kha dog thams cad yongs su ston pa /
translated: He was extremely subtle, yet he revealed all the colors and natures of the buddhas in the vast, subtle particles.

original: phyogs gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba de lta bu'i yon tan dang ye shes mtha' yas pas yang dag par bskyed de /
analyzed: phyogs gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba de lta bu'i yon tan dang ye shes mtha' yas pas yang dag par bskyed de /
translated: He was completely absorbed in one direction, and he had generated infinite qualities and wisdoms like that.

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur pa /
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur pa /
translated: He had the essence of merit and wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa /
translated: He was praised by all the buddhas.

original: 'jam dpal / dge slong 'di dag ni khyod la blta bar 'dod pa dag go /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / dge slong 'di dag ni khyod la blta bar 'dod pa dag go /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, these monks wish to see you.”

original: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i phyogs de tsam dang bcas pa glang po'i lta stangs kyi sa gzi dang ldan par khyab par bltas pa dang / de'i rjes la dge slong de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas /
analyzed: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i phyogs de tsam dang bcas pa glang po'i lta stangs kyi sa gzi dang ldan par khyab par bltas pa dang / de'i rjes la dge slong de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas /
translated: Then those bhikṣus bowed their heads to the feet of Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta,

original: thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so //🔽skyes bu dam pa khyod mthong ba dang / khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang / bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan khyod kyis mkhyen pa dang / mkhan pos thugs su chud pa @84a *//
analyzed: thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so // skyes bu dam pa khyod mthong ba dang / khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang / bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan khyod kyis mkhyen pa dang / mkhan pos thugs su chud pa @84a *//
translated: put their palms together, and said this:🔽“Sublime being, by the root of merit of seeing you and paying homage to you, and by the other roots of merit that you know, that our preceptor knows,

original: dang / gang yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas mngon du gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des khyod ci 'dra bar de 'dra bar gyur te /
analyzed: dang / gang yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas mngon du gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des khyod ci 'dra bar de 'dra bar gyur te /
translated: and that the bhagavān, the tathāgata Śākyamuni has seen, we will become just like you.”

original: rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i lus thob par shog cig /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i lus thob par shog cig /
translated: May we attain a body like yours!

original: rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i dbyangs dang / rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan dang / 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang khyod ji lta ba bzhin thob par shog cig ces /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i dbyangs dang / rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan dang / 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang khyod ji lta ba bzhin thob par shog cig ces /
translated: May we attain a voice like yours, a name like yours, and emanations like yours!”

original: dge slong de dag gis de skad du smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas /
analyzed: dge slong de dag gis de skad du smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas /
translated: When those monks had said this, Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta

original: dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: said to those monks,

original: dge slong dag /🔽yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: dge slong dag / yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: “Monks,

original: rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ni /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i sa lta smos kyang ci smos kyi /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ni / byang chub sems dpa'i sa lta smos kyang ci smos kyi /
translated: sons of noble family or daughters of noble family who have entered the Great Vehicle, who have ten kinds of thoughts that are not discouraged,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yang gnon par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yang gnon par 'gyur ro //
translated: will attain the bodhisattva levels, let alone the level of the tathāgatas.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa las phyir mi ldog cing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa las phyir mi ldog cing /
translated: It is to give rise to an indefatigable mind in seeing all thus-gone ones, serving them, making offerings to them, and venerating them.🔽It is to give rise to an indefatigable mind in accumulating all roots of virtue without turning back.

original: yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad btsal ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sbyor ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /
analyzed: yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad btsal ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sbyor ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /
translated: It is to give rise to an indefatigable mind in seeking all Dharmas. It is to give rise to an indefatigable mind in applying all the perfections of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad @84b yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dus gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du 'jug pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rgyas par dgang zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /🔽sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / zhing dang bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad @84b yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dus gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du 'jug pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rgyas par dgang zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / zhing dang bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /
translated: the generation of the thought of not being discouraged in accomplishing all the bodhisattva concentrations; the generation of the thought of not being discouraged in entering all the successions of time; the generation of the thought of not being discouraged in filling and purifying the ocean of the buddha realms in the ten directions;🔽the generation of the thought of not being discouraged in ripening and guiding all the realms of sentient beings; the generation of the thought of not being discouraged in accomplishing the bodhisattva conduct in all realms and eons;

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyar bas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyar bas /
translated: and the generation of the thought of not being discouraged in the practice of the perfections equal to the atoms in all buddha realms.

original: sems can gcig yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul du sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas /
analyzed: sems can gcig yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul du sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas /
translated: In the manner of bringing one being to complete maturity, he brings all beings to complete maturity.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gcig yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gcig yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa'o //
translated: He generates the thought of not being discouraged in accomplishing one of the powers of the Tathāgata.

original: dge slong dag /🔽yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: dge slong dag / yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Bhikṣus,

original: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa ni /
translated: the faithful son or daughter of good family who has these ten thoughts of not being discouraged

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: will accomplish all roots of merit.

original: 'khor ba'i rgyud thams cad las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgyud thams cad las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will turn away from all the realms of saṃsāra.

original: 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will rise above all the realms of the world.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las yongs su 'da' bar 'gyur ro //🔽de bzhin @85a *//
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las yongs su 'da' bar 'gyur ro // de bzhin @85a *//
translated: He will transcend all the levels of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be born into the family and lineage of all the tathāgatas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will accomplish the aspirations of all bodhisattvas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi nan tan la rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi nan tan la rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will purify the practice of the qualities of all tathāgatas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be completely purified in all bodhisattva conduct.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs la yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs la yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will manifest the power of all tathāgatas.

original: bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will subdue all māras and opponents.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will ascend the bodhisattva levels.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be close to the level of the tathāgatas.”

original: de nas dge slong de dag gis chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas /
analyzed: de nas dge slong de dag gis chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas /
translated: Then, those bhikṣus, having heard this Dharma way,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par mthong ba la chags pa med pa'i mig gi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par mthong ba la chags pa med pa'i mig gi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to //
translated: attained the samādhi called the domain of the eye that is free of attachment to the vision of all buddhas.

original: de'i mthus phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur to //🔽'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi 'gro ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to //
analyzed: de'i mthus phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur to // 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi 'gro ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to //
translated: By the power of that, they saw the maṇḍalas of the retinues of the tathāgatas dwelling in the worlds in the ten directions that are limitless and endless.🔽They also saw all the beings born in the realms of those worlds.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can rnams kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can rnams kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to //
translated: They also saw all the beings in those worlds.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam par phye ba sna tshogs @85b su mthong bar gyur to //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam par phye ba sna tshogs @85b su mthong bar gyur to //
translated: They also saw the various divisions of those worlds.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu shes par gyur to //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu shes par gyur to //
translated: They also knew by means of counting the number of atoms in those worlds.

original: sems can de dag gi rin po che'i gnas dang longs spyod de dag kyang mthong bar gyur to //
analyzed: sems can de dag gi rin po che'i gnas dang longs spyod de dag kyang mthong bar gyur to //
translated: They also saw the precious abodes and enjoyments of those beings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho yang thos par gyur to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho yang thos par gyur to //
translated: He heard the ocean of the melodious voices of those tathagatas.

original: chos bstan pa de dag kyang tshig dang / yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / skad dang / ming dang / brdas yongs su shes par gyur to //
analyzed: chos bstan pa de dag kyang tshig dang / yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / skad dang / ming dang / brdas yongs su shes par gyur to //
translated: He understood those Dharma teachings through words, syllables, definitions, languages, names, and symbols.

original: sems can de dag gi sems dang / dbang po dang / bsam pa la yang rnam par lta bar gyur to //
analyzed: sems can de dag gi sems dang / dbang po dang / bsam pa la yang rnam par lta bar gyur to //
translated: He looked at the minds, faculties, and thoughts of those beings.

original: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i tshe rabs bcu yang rjes su dran par gyur to //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i tshe rabs bcu yang rjes su dran par gyur to //
translated: He remembered ten previous lives and ten future lives.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo bcu'i nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo bcu'i nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
translated: He engaged in the accomplishment of the ten definitive words of the wheel of Dharma of those tathagatas.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
translated: He engaged in the accomplishment of ten kinds of miraculous manifestations.

original: bstan pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to; ;rjes su bstan pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: bstan pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to; ;rjes su bstan pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
translated: they engaged in the ten ways of accomplishing the words of instruction;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
translated: they engaged in the ten ways of accomplishing the way of the knowledge of the differences of those thus-gone ones;

original: ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag stong phrag bcu yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag stong phrag bcu yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur to //
translated: as soon as they attained that samādhi, they perfected ten thousand branches of the mind of awakening;

original: ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu @86a *//🔽yang yongs su non par gyur to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu @86a *// yang yongs su non par gyur to //
translated: they mastered ten thousand samādhis;

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag stong phrag bcu yang rnam par dag par gyur te /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag stong phrag bcu yang rnam par dag par gyur te /
translated: they purified ten thousand branches of the perfections;

original: snang ba chen po rab tu thob cing shes rab chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyis snang bar gyur pa de dag gis /
analyzed: snang ba chen po rab tu thob cing shes rab chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyis snang bar gyur pa de dag gis /
translated: they attained great illumination and were illuminated by the sphere of great wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu rab tu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu rab tu thob par gyur to //
translated: They attained the ten higher knowledges of the bodhisattvas.

original: de ltar mngon par shes pa'i myu gu gzhon zhing shin tu phra ba thob ste /
analyzed: de ltar mngon par shes pa'i myu gu gzhon zhing shin tu phra ba thob ste /
translated: In that way, they attained the sprouts of the higher knowledges, which were tender and delicate.

original: byang chub tu sems skyes pa brtan pa la gnas pa de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas /
analyzed: byang chub tu sems skyes pa brtan pa la gnas pa de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas /
translated: Those who had generated the mind of awakening and were abiding in stability were inspired by Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul nas rab tu bkod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul nas rab tu bkod do //
translated: to the conduct of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra and were established in it.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa de dag smon lam chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs shing mngon par bsgrub par gyur to //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa de dag smon lam chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs shing mngon par bsgrub par gyur to //
translated: In that way, those who were abiding in the conduct of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra entered the ocean of great prayers and accomplished them.

original: de ltar smon lam chen po rgya mtshos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sems rnam par dag pas lus yongs su dag pa rab tu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: de ltar smon lam chen po rgya mtshos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sems rnam par dag pas lus yongs su dag pa rab tu thob par gyur to //
translated: In that way, through the accomplishment of the ocean of great prayers, they attained the pure body with a pure mind.

original: lus rnam par dag pas lus yang ba rab tu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: lus rnam par dag pas lus yang ba rab tu thob par gyur to //
translated: Through the purity of the body, they attained a light body.

original: de ltar lus rnam par dag pa dang / lus yang bas mngon par shes pa'i sgo de dag shin tu yangs par byed pas mi nyams shing /🔽rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: de ltar lus rnam par dag pa dang / lus yang bas mngon par shes pa'i sgo de dag shin tu yangs par byed pas mi nyams shing / rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par gyur to //
translated: In this way, their bodies became pure and light, and the doors of their superknowledges became vast and unimpeded.🔽They attained the superknowledge that follows.

original: mngon par shes pa de dag thob pas /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa de dag thob pas /
translated: Having attained these superknowledges,

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa'i drung nas kyang mi g-yo la /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa'i drung nas kyang mi g-yo la /
translated: they did not move from the presence of youthful Mañjuśrī,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs @86b su bsgrub pa'i phyir phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin las kyi sprin mngon par bsgrub par gyur to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs @86b su bsgrub pa'i phyir phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin las kyi sprin mngon par bsgrub par gyur to //
translated: but in order to accomplish all the qualities of the buddhas, they manifested clouds of emanations of the enlightened activity of all the thus-gone ones in the ten directions.

original: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas /
analyzed: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas /
translated: Then youthful Mañjuśrī

original: dge slong de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod nas /
analyzed: dge slong de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod nas /
translated: established those monks in unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: mthar gyis yul rgyu zhing lho phyogs logs skyid pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i grong rdal chen po gang na ba der logs su song ste phyin nas /
analyzed: mthar gyis yul rgyu zhing lho phyogs logs skyid pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i grong rdal chen po gang na ba der logs su song ste phyin nas /
translated: Eventually, he went to the south and came to a great city called Source of Happiness.

original: grong rdal chen po skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi shar phyogs logs na nags tshal chen po s'a la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba sngon gyi sangs rgyas bzhugs bzhugs pa'i mchod rten /
analyzed: grong rdal chen po skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi shar phyogs logs na nags tshal chen po s'a la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba sngon gyi sangs rgyas bzhugs bzhugs pa'i mchod rten /
translated: To the east of the great city Source of Happiness, there was a great forest called Banner of Various Sāla Trees, a place where previous buddhas had stayed and where stūpas had been erected.

original: 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad la snyoms par nan tan du bya ba'i phyir byams pa chen po'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal kyi phung po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bde ba'i sems dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad la snyoms par nan tan du bya ba'i phyir byams pa chen po'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal kyi phung po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bde ba'i sems dang /
translated: “ They have a mind of great compassion in order to protect all beings; they have a mind of great love in order to be diligent in impartiality toward all beings; they have a mind of happiness in order to pacify the mass of suffering of all beings;

original: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir phan pa'i sems dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir snying brtse ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i sems dang /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir phan pa'i sems dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir snying brtse ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i sems dang /
translated: It is the mind of benefit in order to turn away from all nonvirtuous dharmas; it is the mind of compassion in order to protect from all fears; it is the mind of nonattachment in order to turn away from all obscurations;

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rgya chen po'i sems dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu gzhol zhing kun tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'i sems dang /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rgya chen po'i sems dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu gzhol zhing kun tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'i sems dang /
translated: it is the mind of vastness in order to fill the entire realm of phenomena; it is the mind of infinity in order to be directed toward and to go everywhere in the realm of space; it is the stainless mind in order to see and perceive all tathāgatas;

original: dus gsum gyi dmigs pa ma lus par ye shes kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ye shes kyi sems kyang skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi dmigs pa ma lus par ye shes kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ye shes kyi sems kyang skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the mind of purity, in order to fill completely with wisdom the objects of the three times; and the mind of wisdom, in order to enter the ocean of omniscient wisdom.

original: rigs kyi bu /🔽kho bos ni phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i @103a *//
analyzed: rigs kyi bu / kho bos ni phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i @103a *//
translated: “Noble son,🔽I have been in this ocean gateway of the land of the directions for twelve years,

original: sgo 'dir lo bcu gnyis su rgya mtsho chen po 'di la dmigs te /
analyzed: sgo 'dir lo bcu gnyis su rgya mtsho chen po 'di la dmigs te /
translated: and I have focused on this great ocean.

original: mngon du byas nas 'di ltar rgya mtsho rgya che zhing tshad med pa rjes su bsam pa dang / dri ma med cing dang ba dang / zab cing gting dpag dka' ba dang / bags kyis gzhol zhing legs par gnas pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas du mas rnam par brgyan pa dang /
analyzed: mngon du byas nas 'di ltar rgya mtsho rgya che zhing tshad med pa rjes su bsam pa dang / dri ma med cing dang ba dang / zab cing gting dpag dka' ba dang / bags kyis gzhol zhing legs par gnas pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas du mas rnam par brgyan pa dang /
translated: I have contemplated the ocean as being vast and immeasurable, as being stainless and clear, as being deep and difficult to fathom, as being gradually sloping and well situated, and as being adorned with many sources of jewels.

original: chu'i phung po tshad med pa dang / kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa mang zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'byung po mtha' yas pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang / srog chags mang po sna tshogs kyi rten du gyur pa dang / sprin chen po'i char yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: chu'i phung po tshad med pa dang / kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa mang zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'byung po mtha' yas pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang / srog chags mang po sna tshogs kyi rten du gyur pa dang / sprin chen po'i char yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
translated: I reflected on the immeasurable mass of water, the many different colors that are inconceivable, the abode of infinite beings, the support of many different kinds of creatures, the holder of the great clouds’ rain,

original: gang zhing 'bri bar 'gyur ba med pa la rjes su sems pa byed cing gnas gnas te /🔽rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: gang zhing 'bri bar 'gyur ba med pa la rjes su sems pa byed cing gnas gnas te / rigs kyi bu /
translated: and the absence of any increase or decrease.

original: de la kho bos 'di snyam du bsams so //🔽'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgya mtsho chen po 'di bas kyang 'phags par rgya che la 'di bas kyang yangs shing /
analyzed: de la kho bos 'di snyam du bsams so // 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgya mtsho chen po 'di bas kyang 'phags par rgya che la 'di bas kyang yangs shing /
translated: “Noble son, I thought to myself,

original: 'di bas kyang tshad med la 'di bas kyang ngo mtshar dang ldan pa la la zhig yod dam snyam ste /
analyzed: 'di bas kyang tshad med la 'di bas kyang ngo mtshar dang ldan pa la la zhig yod dam snyam ste /
translated: ‘In this world system, is there anything that is more exalted, more vast, more immeasurable, and more marvelous than this great ocean?’

original: de de ltar kho bos tshul bzhin du bsam pa yid la byed pa la brtson par gnas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de de ltar kho bos tshul bzhin du bsam pa yid la byed pa la brtson par gnas pa'i tshe /
translated: I reflected in this way, and I persevered in my contemplation.

original: rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og gi gzhi las padma chen po nor bu rin po che aindra n'i la thub pa med cing rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i chu ba can /
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og gi gzhi las padma chen po nor bu rin po che aindra n'i la thub pa med cing rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i chu ba can /
translated: From the ground beneath the great ocean, a great lotus appeared, with an indestructible vajra-hard stem,

original: nor bu rin po che bee d'urya dam pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che bee d'urya dam pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
translated: adorned with the finest beryl jewels,

original: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser ltar dri ma med pa'i lo ma @103b rgya chen po can /
analyzed: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser ltar dri ma med pa'i lo ma @103b rgya chen po can /
translated: with vast leaves as pure as the gold of the Jambū River,

original: dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi snying po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi snying po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with ornaments of the essence of sandalwood that accords with the seasons,

original: rin po che aasma gar bha'i ze ba can /
analyzed: rin po che aasma gar bha'i ze ba can /
translated: with pistils of asmagarbha jewels,

original: rgya mtsho tsam du yangs shing rgya che ba /
analyzed: rgya mtsho tsam du yangs shing rgya che ba /
translated: vast and expansive like the ocean,

original: lha ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus sdong po'i lhun nas bzung ba /
analyzed: lha ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus sdong po'i lhun nas bzung ba /
translated: held aloft by ten thousand lords of the asuras,

original: rin po che sna tshogs brgya phrag stong gi dra bas kun nas yog pa /
analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs brgya phrag stong gi dra bas kun nas yog pa /
translated: covered with nets of hundreds of thousands of various jewels,

original: klu'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spos chu'i char mngon par phab pa /
analyzed: klu'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spos chu'i char mngon par phab pa /
translated: and rained upon with fragrant waters by ten thousand lords of the nāgas.

original: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus dar dang rin po che'i lda ldi dang / sen mo do mang po mchus gzung zhing rab tu dbyangs pa /
analyzed: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus dar dang rin po che'i lda ldi dang / sen mo do mang po mchus gzung zhing rab tu dbyangs pa /
translated: There were 100,000 lords of the garuḍas holding up canopies of silk and jewels with their beaks and singing.

original: mi'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas blta ba /
analyzed: mi'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas blta ba /
translated: There were 100,000 lords of the kinnaras looking on with helpful thoughts.

original: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus 'khor nas mngon par 'dud pa /
analyzed: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus 'khor nas mngon par 'dud pa /
translated: There were 100,000 lords of the mahoragas surrounding him and bowing down.

original: srin po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lus btud cing mngon par mchod pa /
analyzed: srin po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lus btud cing mngon par mchod pa /
translated: There were 100,000 lords of the rākṣasas bowing their bodies and making offerings.

original: dri za'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo dang glu sna tshogs snyan pas bstod cing mchod pa /
analyzed: dri za'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo dang glu sna tshogs snyan pas bstod cing mchod pa /
translated: There were 100,000 lords of the gandharvas praising him with sweet music and songs.

original: lha'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par phab pa /
analyzed: lha'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par phab pa /
translated: Ten thousand lords of the gods rained down clouds of divine flowers, incense, garlands, perfume, ointments, powders, clothes, parasols, victory banners, and divine flags.

original: tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa /
translated: Ten thousand lords of the Brahmā realm bowed their heads and paid homage.

original: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar cing phyag bya ba /
analyzed: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar cing phyag bya ba /
translated: Ten thousand gods of the Pure Abodes joined their palms and paid homage.

original: mi'i dbang po 'khor los bsgyur ba brgya @104a *//
analyzed: mi'i dbang po 'khor los bsgyur ba brgya @104a *//
translated: Ten thousand human lords, universal monarchs,

original: stong phrag bcus rin po che sna bdun gyis bsu zhing mngon par mchod pa /
analyzed: stong phrag bcus rin po che sna bdun gyis bsu zhing mngon par mchod pa /
translated: welcomed him and made offerings with the seven kinds of precious substances.

original: rgya mtsho'i lha brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par 'thon cing phyag bya ba /
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i lha brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par 'thon cing phyag bya ba /
translated: Ten thousand ocean deities emerged and paid homage.

original: nor bu rin po che skar ma'i ngad brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'od zer gyi rgyan gyis rab tu snang bar byas pa /🔽nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag pa brgya stong phrag bcus mkhos su phebs par 'phel bas rab tu brgyan pa /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che skar ma'i ngad brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'od zer gyi rgyan gyis rab tu snang bar byas pa / nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag pa brgya stong phrag bcus mkhos su phebs par 'phel bas rab tu brgyan pa /
translated: It was adorned with ten myriads of light rays from the precious jewel Star Radiance.🔽It was adorned with ten myriads of the precious jewel Pure Merit.

original: nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po rab tu gsal bar byas pa /🔽nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po brgya stong phrag bcus dpal chen po shin tu 'bar bar gyur pa /🔽nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs brgya stong phrag bcus mtha' yas par snang bar byas pa /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po rab tu gsal bar byas pa / nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po brgya stong phrag bcus dpal chen po shin tu 'bar bar gyur pa / nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs brgya stong phrag bcus mtha' yas par snang bar byas pa /
translated: It was adorned with ten myriads of the precious jewel Radiance.🔽It was adorned with ten myriads of the precious jewel Essence of Glory.🔽It was adorned with ten myriads of the precious jewel Treasury of Various Colors.

original: nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su ston par gnas pas rab tu brgyan pa /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su ston par gnas pas rab tu brgyan pa /
translated: It was adorned with ten myriads of the precious jewel River of the Jambu River.

original: nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ge brgya stong phrag bcus thub pa med par brgyan pa /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ge brgya stong phrag bcus thub pa med par brgyan pa /
translated: It was adorned with ten myriads of the precious jewel Lion of the Vajra.

original: nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po brgya stong phrag bcus rgya cher gsal ba bsgrubs pa /🔽nor bu rin po che 'bar ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog sna tshogs su brgyan pa /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po brgya stong phrag bcus rgya cher gsal ba bsgrubs pa / nor bu rin po che 'bar ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog sna tshogs su brgyan pa /
translated: It was illuminated by a hundred thousand precious jewels of the essence of the sun.🔽It was adorned with a hundred thousand precious jewels of blazing light.

original: nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus mi zad pa'i rgyan dang / 'od 'bar bar byas pa byung ste /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus mi zad pa'i rgyan dang / 'od 'bar bar byas pa byung ste /
translated: It was adorned with a hundred thousand precious jewels of the king of wish-fulfilling gems, which were inexhaustible ornaments and blazing light.

original: padmo chen po de ni /
analyzed: padmo chen po de ni /
translated: That great lotus

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das @104b ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das @104b ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'o //
translated: was born from the roots of merit of the Tathāgata that are beyond the world.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su brtan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su brtan pa'o //
translated: It was made firm by the intention of the bodhisattvas.

original: phyogs thams cad du mngon par dmigs su yod pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs thams cad du mngon par dmigs su yod pa'o //
translated: It was visible in all directions.

original: sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos kyis byung ba'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos kyis byung ba'o //
translated: It was born from the Dharma of the nature of illusion.

original: rjen pa'i dri ma med pa'i las kyis byung ba'o //
analyzed: rjen pa'i dri ma med pa'i las kyis byung ba'o //
translated: It was born from the pure actions of the past.

original: nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis brgyan pa'o //
translated: It was adorned with the way of the Dharma of the absence of afflictions.

original: rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid kyis yongs su byung ba'o //🔽mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid kyis yongs su byung ba'o // mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: It is the nature of phenomena, which is like a dream.🔽It is the seal of the way of the non-arising of phenomena.

original: chags pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with the way of the non-attachment of phenomena.

original: phyogs kyi khams kun tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs kyi khams kun tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'o //
translated: It is the pervasiveness of the realm of phenomena throughout the entire realm of space.

original: sangs rgyas kyi yul brjod pa dang mthun pa ste /🔽de'i rnam pa dang / yon tan dang / dbyibs dang / kha dog dang / rgyan gyi mthar phyin par ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yul brjod pa dang mthun pa ste / de'i rnam pa dang / yon tan dang / dbyibs dang / kha dog dang / rgyan gyi mthar phyin par ni /
translated: It is the domain of the buddhas.

original: bskal pa brgya stong grangs med par yang khong du chud par mi nus te /
analyzed: bskal pa brgya stong grangs med par yang khong du chud par mi nus te /
translated: Its aspects, qualities, shapes, colors, and adornments are beyond comprehension even in countless hundreds of thousands of eons.

original: padmo chen po de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung du bzhugs pas khyab cing /
analyzed: padmo chen po de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung du bzhugs pas khyab cing /
translated: That great lotus is pervaded and filled with the body of the Tathāgata seated cross-legged.

original: yongs su rgyas par mthong ngo //
analyzed: yongs su rgyas par mthong ngo //
translated: It is seen like that.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sku de yang 'di nas bzung ba nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sku de yang 'di nas bzung ba nas /
translated: That body of the Tathāgata is seen from here

original: srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi mthas klas par mthong ngo //
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi mthas klas par mthong ngo //
translated: up to the peak of existence.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang mthong ngo //
translated: He saw the inconceivable adornments of the seat of that Tathāgata.

original: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpe byad bzang @105a *//
analyzed: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpe byad bzang @105a *//
translated: He saw the inconceivable adornments of the circle of his retinue, the inconceivable adornments of the circle of his light, the inconceivable perfection of his major marks,

original: bzang po sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /🔽spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ljags yangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo //
analyzed: bzang po sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /🔽spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ljags yangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo //
translated: the inconceivable variety of his excellent minor marks, the inconceivable power of the bull of the Buddha, the inconceivable emanations of the Buddha, the inconceivable purity of the body of the Tathāgata,🔽and the inconceivable vastness of his tongue.

original: sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang thos so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang thos so //
translated: He hears the inconceivable adornments of the Buddha’s speech and the inconceivable circle of his voice.

original: stobs tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mi bsnyems pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stobs mngon par bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rjes su shes so //
analyzed: stobs tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mi bsnyems pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stobs mngon par bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rjes su shes so //
translated: He understands the inconceivable, immeasurable powers, the inconceivable, pure adornments of self-confidence, and the accomplishment of the power of the knowledge of distinctions.

original: sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rjes su dran no //
analyzed: sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rjes su dran no //
translated: He recollects the inconceivable, perfect accomplishment of the bodhisattva conduct in the past.

original: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo //
translated: He sees the inconceivable miracles of perfect enlightenment.

original: chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra mngon par bsgrags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / yongs su bstan pa rnam par dmigs pa'i gnas dang / rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang thos so //

translated: I heard the inconceivable thunder of Dharma clouds, the inconceivable places of the display of teachings, and the inconceivable ornaments.

translated: He heard the lords of the kinnaras singing and playing all kinds of celestial music and praising with sweet voices the monk Sthiramati.

analyzed: dge slong shin tu brtan pa la byams pa'i mthu dang ldan par 'khor ba mthong ngo //

translated: I will never be separated from the realm of conditioned existence in order to experience through my own body the passing away and rebirth in all the existences of saṃsāra through the bodhisattva conduct that is like a magical creation.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung ba'i slad du chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dus gsum gyi ye shes khong du chud cing rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba'i slad du ye shes snang ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba de bdag la bstan du gsol /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung ba'i slad du chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dus gsum gyi ye shes khong du chud cing rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba'i slad du ye shes snang ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba de bdag la bstan du gsol /
translated: I ask that you teach me how to never be separated from listening to the Dharma in order to uphold the Dharma clouds of all the tathāgatas, and how to never be separated from the light of wisdom in order to comprehend and follow the wisdom of the three times.”

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong shin tu brtan pas /
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong shin tu brtan pas /
translated: When he had said that, the bhikṣu Sthiramati

analyzed: las kyi rigs thams cad dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa yin /
